content:
You're already ahead of the game with your coastal-themed decor! It's great that you're planning to repurpose those items in your new space.

And yes, I'm familiar with World Market! They're a fantastic resource for unique, international-inspired decor, furniture, and gifts. Their selection of handmade items, like textiles, ceramics, and woodcarvings, can add a lot of character to your space. Plus, their international foods and spices can be a great way to explore new flavors and cuisines.

World Market is also a great place to find coastal-inspired decor, like woven baskets, nautical-themed accessories, or decorative accents with a global twist. You might find items that evoke the feeling of a seaside market or a tropical island getaway.

Some items to keep an eye out for at World Market:

* Handmade textiles, like woven baskets, blankets, or throw pillows
* Unique ceramics, like vases, planters, or decorative accents
* International-inspired decorative accents, like Moroccan tiles, Indian-inspired prints, or African masks
* Coastal-themed decor, like nautical ropes, anchors, or starfish-shaped decorative items
* Global foods and spices, like artisanal chocolates, specialty teas, or exotic spices

When you visit World Market, take your time to explore and get inspiration from their displays. You might find items that spark new ideas for your coastal-themed space or discover unique gifts for friends and family.

Enjoy your shopping adventure, and I hope you find some amazing treasures to enhance your new space!
